attributes.action: Education for all the children in LEDC's
attributes.additional_details:
We want to make sure that every child in ledc gets and education. By getting education they are making their future brighter and much better,

We would like the Government of various ledc's to make sure that every child gets an education in their town. By working from a small age they are ruining their present and future. They should be able to go to school and have a right to education.
